aboutIntro: I'm Guido Llaurado, a web developer specialized in creating modern, fast and easy-to-use websites for professionals and small businesses. I work with current technologies like Next.js, React and Vercel so your website loads quickly, looks professional and helps you get more clients.
aboutTechnologies: I take care of everything: design, development, optimization, forms, payment integration, basic SEO and continuous support. My goal is for you to have a clear, effective website ready to work from day one.
aboutClosure: If you need a professional website to showcase your services, sell more or improve your online presence, I can help you achieve it in a simple and fast way.
authorityPill: Authority, data and design at your business service
authorityTitle: Not just design. I build digital tools that generate revenue and optimize your business.
authoritySubtitle: I work in digital business engineering. My focus is creating a key piece for your company: clean code, refined aesthetics, superior performance and clear metrics to scale your operations and campaigns.
authorityBullet1: My experience ranges from E-commerce and B2B platforms to Custom Software, with key integrations like Stripe and other APIs.
authorityBullet2: I implement Analytics, key events and advertising pixels, ensuring every business decision is backed by accurate data.
authorityBullet3: Direct technical support. You'll always communicate with me; I eliminate intermediaries for a more agile and personalized solution.
authority1Desc: I design clean and fast interfaces. I guide your user to the main action, whether it's buying, registering, or contacting, maximizing your conversion rate.
authority2Desc: I integrate payment gateways (Stripe, etc.) and automations. I ensure every transaction is tracked and measurable, giving you total control of your sales funnel.
authority3Desc: I set up GA4 and advertising pixels (Meta, TikTok). This allows you to optimize your marketing campaigns with 100% real data, eliminating guesswork.
authority4Desc: I use modern technologies (Next.js, APIs) and create stable integrations. I guarantee your project will never have technical limits when growing or scaling.
projectsSubtitle: My portfolio is proof of my approach. I design and develop complex solutions (SaaS, E-commerce, Management Software), where every line of code solves a real business problem, not just aesthetics.
project1Desc: Platform to connect talent and companies. Includes user profiles, auto-subscription system and admin panel. This project demonstrated solid organic growth thanks to its stability, UX and integrated analytics.
project1Result: Organic growth and model validation thanks to a stable and easy-to-use product.
project2Desc: Custom internal application for managing fields, tasks and production. Its main value is improving traceability and real-time decision-making, achieving greater operational efficiency and fewer errors.
project2Result: Centralized information, fewer operational errors and better business control.
project3Desc: Complete online store with Stripe and shipping integration (Sendcloud). The system automates the end-to-end sales process (order, payment, shipping label), achieving a fully measurable purchase funnel.
project3Result: Automatic sales process: order, payment, shipping label generation and customer notifications.
